00026 data_t::data_t(digit_t initial1, digit_t initial2, digit_t initial3) {
00027     mLength=1;
00028     mAllocated=QuickDigits::count;
00029     digits=mQuickDigits;
00030     digits[0]=initial1;
00031     digits[1]=initial2;
00032     digits[2]=initial3;
00033     mCopies=0;
00034     mIsNegative=false;
00035 }
00036 
00038 data_t::data_t(data_t *c) {
00039     mLength=c->mLength;
00040     if (c->digits == c->mQuickDigits) {
00041         digits=mQuickDigits;
00042         mAllocated=QuickDigits::count;
00043     } else {
00044         try {
00045             mAllocated=mLength;
00046             #ifdef XINT_SECURE
00047                 digits=new digit_t[mAllocated];
00048             #else
00049                 mStorage.resize(mAllocated, 0);
00050                 digits=&mStorage[0];
00051             #endif
00052         } catch (std::bad_alloc&) {
00053             throw xint::overflow_error("Out of memory allocating xint::integer");
00054         }
00055     }
00056     memcpy(digits, c->digits, mLength*sizeof(digit_t));
00057 
00058     mCopies=0;
00059     mIsNegative=c->mIsNegative;
00060 }
00061 
00062 #ifdef XINT_SECURE
00063 data_t::~data_t() {
00064     zero(mQuickDigits, QuickDigits::count);
00065     if (digits != mQuickDigits) {
00066         zero(digits, mAllocated);
00067         delete[] digits;
00068     }
00069 }
00070 #endif
00071 
00076 void data_t::skipLeadingZeros() {
00077     digit_t *d=digits+mLength-1;
00078     while (d>digits && *d==0) --d;
00079     mLength=int((d-digits)+1);
00080     if (mLength==1 && digits[0]==0) mIsNegative=false; // Zero isn't negative
00081 }
00082 
00083 void data_t::quickset(digit_t d1, digit_t d2, digit_t d3) {
00084     assert(mCopies==1);
00085 
00086     mLength=3;
00087     digits[0]=d1;
00088     digits[1]=d2;
00089     digits[2]=d3;
00090     mIsNegative=false;
00091     skipLeadingZeros();
00092 }

00094 void data_t::alloc(size_t newcount, bool copydigits) {
00095     if (digits==mQuickDigits && newcount<=QuickDigits::count) {
00096         if (!copydigits) zero(digits, QuickDigits::count);
00097         else zero(digits+mLength, (newcount-mLength));
00098         mLength=newcount;
00099     } else if (newcount < mAllocated) {
00100         if (copydigits) {
00101             if (newcount>mLength) zero(digits+mLength, newcount-mLength);
00102             mLength=newcount;
00103         } else {
00104             mLength=newcount;
00105             zero(digits, mLength);
00106         }
00107     } else {
00108         #ifdef XINT_SECURE
00109             int e=newcount;
00110             newcount=1;
00111             while (newcount < e) newcount <<= 1;
00112         #endif
00113 
00114         if (digits==mQuickDigits && copydigits) {
00115             try {
00116                 #ifdef XINT_SECURE
00117                     digits=new digit_t[newcount];
00118                 #else
00119                     mStorage.resize(newcount);
00120                     digits=&mStorage[0];
00121                 #endif
00122             } catch (std::bad_alloc&) {
00123                 digits=mQuickDigits; // Might allow for recovery in some cases
00124                 throw xint::overflow_error("Out of memory allocating xint::integer");
00125             }
00126 
00127             memcpy(digits, mQuickDigits, mLength*sizeof(digit_t));
00128             zero(digits+mLength, newcount-mLength);
00129         } else {
00130             #ifdef XINT_SECURE
00131                 digit_t *newDigits=0;
00132                 try {
00133                     newDigits=new digit_t[newcount];
00134                 } catch (std::bad_alloc&) {
00135                     throw xint::overflow_error("Out of memory allocating xint::integer");
00136                 }
00137 
00138                 if (copydigits) {
00139                     memcpy(newDigits, digits, mLength*sizeof(digit_t));
00140                     zero(newDigits+mLength, newcount-mLength);
00141                 } else zero(newDigits, newcount);
00142 
00143                 if (digits!=mQuickDigits) {
00144                     zero(digits, mAllocated);
00145                     delete[] digits;
00146                 }
00147                 digits=newDigits;
00148             #else
00149                 try {
00150                     mStorage.resize(newcount);
00151                 } catch (std::bad_alloc&) {
00152                     throw xint::overflow_error("Out of memory allocating xint::integer");
00153                 }
00154                 digits=&mStorage[0];
00155                 if (!copydigits) zero(digits, newcount);
00156             #endif
00157         }
00158         mLength=mAllocated=newcount;
00159     }
00160 }

00162 void data_t::copy(const data_t *c, size_t extraDigits) {
00163     alloc(c->mLength+extraDigits);
00164 
00165     mLength=c->mLength;
00166     if (c->mLength==1) *digits = *c->digits;
00167     else memcpy(digits, c->digits, mLength*sizeof(digit_t));
00168 
00169     mIsNegative=c->mIsNegative;
00170 
00171     // Deliberately doesn't call skipLeadingZeros().
00172 }
00173 
00174 void data_t::zero(digit_t *p, size_t count) {
00175     digit_t *pe=p+count;
00176     while (p<pe) *p++=0;
00177 }

00179 void data_t::invert() {
00180     assert(mCopies==1);
00181 
00182     mIsNegative=!mIsNegative;
00183 
00184     digit_t *d=digits, *e=d+mLength;
00185     while (d<e) {
00186         *d=static_cast<digit_t>(digit_overflowbit - 1 - *d);
00187         ++d;
00188     }
00189 
00190     d=digits;
00191     while (d<e) {
00192         doubledigit_t w=(*d)+1;
00193         (*d++)=static_cast<digit_t>(w);
00194         if (w<digit_overflowbit) break;
00195     }
00196 
00197     skipLeadingZeros();
00198 }
00199 
00200 void data_t::negate() {
00201     assert(mCopies==1);
00202 
00203     // If it's zero, don't change the sign
00204     if (mLength>1 || digits[0]!=0) mIsNegative=!mIsNegative;
00205 }

00207 void data_t::add(const data_t& addend) {
00208     assert(mCopies==1);
00209     assert(mLength >= addend.mLength);
00210 
00211     // The answer to any addition problem contains, at most, one digit more
00212     // than the largest addend.
00213     realloc(mLength+1);
00214 
00215     // Now add the digits, starting at the least-significant digit.
00216     digit_t carry=0;
00217     size_t x=0;
00218     for (; x<addend.mLength; ++x) {
00219         doubledigit_t t=doubledigit_t(digits[x])+addend.digits[x]+carry;
00220         if (t>=digit_overflowbit) { carry=1; t-=digit_overflowbit; } else carry=0;
00221         digits[x]=static_cast<digit_t>(t);
00222     }
00223 
00224     while (carry) {
00225         doubledigit_t t=doubledigit_t(digits[x])+1;
00226         if (t>=digit_overflowbit) { carry=1; t-=digit_overflowbit; } else carry=0;
00227         digits[x]=static_cast<digit_t>(t);
00228         ++x;
00229     }
00230 
00231     skipLeadingZeros();
00232 }
00233 
00234 void data_t::subtract(const data_t& subtrahend) {
00235     assert(mCopies==1);
00236     assert(mLength >= subtrahend.mLength);
00237 
00238     // For subtraction, the answer will always be less than or equal to the
00239     // size of the longest operand, so we've already got enough room.
00240 
00241     // Now subtract the digits, starting at the least-significant one.
00242     size_t x;
00243     int borrow=0;
00244     doubledigit_t t;
00245     for (x=0; x<subtrahend.mLength; ++x) {
00246         t=(digits[x]+digit_overflowbit)-subtrahend.digits[x]-borrow;
00247         if (t<digit_overflowbit) borrow=1; else { borrow=0; t-=digit_overflowbit; }
00248         digits[x]=static_cast<digit_t>(t);
00249     }
00250 
00251     for (; x<mLength && borrow; ++x) {
00252         t=(digits[x]+digit_overflowbit)-borrow;
00253         if (t<digit_overflowbit) borrow=1; else { borrow=0; t-=digit_overflowbit; }
00254         digits[x]=static_cast<digit_t>(t);
00255     }
00256 
00257     if (borrow) negate();
00258     skipLeadingZeros();
00259 }
00260 
00261 void data_t::shift_left(size_t byBits) {
00262     assert(mCopies==1);
00263     assert(byBits>0);
00264 
00265     size_t bytes=byBits / bits_per_digit, bits=byBits % bits_per_digit;
00266     size_t oldLength=mLength;
00267 
00268     realloc(mLength+bytes+1);
00269 
00270     if (bits != 0) {
00271         // Handle both bits and bytes in one pass
00272         digit_t *s=digits+oldLength-1, *t=s+bytes+1;
00273 
00274         *t-- = *s >> (bits_per_digit - bits);
00275         while (s > digits) {
00276             *t = (*s-- << bits);
00277             *t-- |= (*s >> (bits_per_digit - bits));
00278         }
00279         *t = (*s << bits);
00280 
00281         if (bytes != 0) memset(digits, 0, sizeof(digit_t) * bytes);
00282     } else if (bytes != 0) {
00283         memmove(digits+bytes, digits, sizeof(digit_t) * oldLength);
00284         memset(digits, 0, sizeof(digit_t) * bytes);
00285     }
00286     skipLeadingZeros();
00287 }
00288 
00289 void data_t::shift_right(size_t byBits) {
00290     assert(mCopies==1);
00291     assert(byBits>0);
00292 
00293     size_t bytes=byBits / bits_per_digit, bits=byBits % bits_per_digit,
00294         bits2 = bits_per_digit - bits;
00295 
00296     if (bytes >= mLength) {
00297         // Right-shift it into oblivion.
00298         mLength=1;
00299         *digits=0;
00300     } else if (bits != 0) {
00301         // Handle both bits and bytes in one pass
00302         digit_t *t=digits, *s=digits+bytes, *se=digits+mLength-1;
00303         while (s!=se) {
00304             *t = (*s++ >> bits);
00305             *t++ |= (*s << bits2);
00306         }
00307         *t = (*s >> bits);
00308         if (bytes != 0) {
00309             memset(digits+mLength-bytes, 0, sizeof(digit_t) * bytes);
00310             mLength-=bytes;
00311         }
00312         skipLeadingZeros();
00313     } else if (bytes != 0) {
00314         memmove(digits, digits + bytes, sizeof(digit_t) * (mLength - bytes));
00315         memset(digits + mLength - bytes, 0, sizeof(digit_t) * bytes);
00316         mLength-=bytes;
00317         skipLeadingZeros();
00318     }
00319 }
